attr.title: Commander Genius
attr.desc:
Commander Genius is an open-source clone of Commander Keen, originally developed by Id Software. This version allows you to play the included episodes (1, 4, 6, and Keen Dreams) immediately. This port supports all officially released episodes as well as additional episodes and mods created by the community.
n
Developed by Gerhard Stein and originally ported by Christian Haitian.
attr.desc_md:
[**Commander Genius**](https://gitlab.com/Dringgstein/Commander-Genius) is an open-source clone of [**Commander Keen**](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Commander_Keen), originally developed by [**Id Software**](https://idsoftware.com). This version allows you to play the included episodes ([1](https://keenwiki.shikadi.net/wiki/Keen_1:_Marooned_on_Mars), [4](https://keenwiki.shikadi.net/wiki/Keen_4:_Secret_of_the_Oracle), [6](https://keenwiki.shikadi.net/wiki/Keen_6:_Aliens_Ate_My_Baby_Sitter!), and [Keen Dreams](https://keenwiki.shikadi.net/wiki/Keen_Dreams)) immediately. Additionally the port supports all officially released episodes as well as additional episodes and mods [created by the community](https://keenwiki.shikadi.net/wiki/Main_Page).

> You are eight-year-old Billy Blaze, boy genius to your neighborhood. Commander Keen to the rest of the universe. It's time to grab your trusty pogo stick and neural stunner, climb into the cockpit of your homemade Megarocket and blast off for adventure. To prevent the obliteration of life as we know it, you'll have to battle your way past deadly hazards and devious creatures, or end up as space toast.

Developed by [**Gerhard Stein**](https://gitlab.com/Dringgstein) and originally ported by [**Christian Haitian**](https://github.com/christianhaitian).
attr.inst:
Includes all of the officially released free content for the Commander Keen series. Includes the shareware episodes (1,4), demo (6) episode, and the lost episode: Keen Dreams.

You can add additional content to this port manually or, if you have an internet connected device, automatically through the launcher. See the Portmaster website for more detailed instructions.
attr.inst_md:
Includes all of the **officially released** free content for the [**Commander Keen**](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Commander_Keen) series. This includes:
- the shareware versions:
  - [**Episode 1: Marooned on Mars**](https://keenwiki.shikadi.net/wiki/Keen_1:_Marooned_on_Mars)
  - [**Episode 4: Secret of the Oracle**](https://keenwiki.shikadi.net/wiki/Keen_4:_Secret_of_the_Oracle)
- the demo version:
  - [**Episode 6: Aliens Ate My Baby Sitter**](https://keenwiki.shikadi.net/wiki/Keen_6:_Aliens_Ate_My_Baby_Sitter!)
- the lost episode:
  - [**Keen Dreams**](https://keenwiki.shikadi.net/wiki/Keen_Dreams)

You can add additional content to this port through one of two ways:
1. **Manually**: You can add load your own game files into the following location, relative to your ports directory: `cgenius/conf/.CommanderGenius/games`. If you opt to load the game files manually, ensure that you update the `games.cfg` within the mentioned directory appropriately.

2. **Automatically**: If you have an internet connection on-device, you can simply download content directly from the launcher (link on bottom left) to access additional [**community created**](https://keenwiki.shikadi.net/wiki/Main_Page) content. Downloading content from the launcher will automatically update your `games.cfg` file, mentioned earlier.
